medical_history.chief_complaint: Epigastric abdominal and left flank pain.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Patient reports pain started yesterday at 8 PM after eating a corn-based meal and coffee with milk. The pain is persistent, accompanied by nausea, but no emesis, chills, or fevers. This condition has recurred over the past unspecified years, with the last episode occurring 2 months ago, which spontaneously resolved.
medical_history.past_medical_history: History of hypertension (HTN) and multinodular goiter.
medical_history.family_history: Father deceased with a history of hypertension (HTN), coronary artery disease (CAD), and seizures; mother with a history of hypertension (HTN).
